meanings.sent1: She outpsyched her opponent by staying calm and focused.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outpsyche his competitors before a big game.
meanings.sent3: The cat outpsyched the mouse by pretending to be asleep.
meanings.sent4: The detective outpsyched the criminal by predicting his next move.
meanings.sent5: The teacher outpsyched the students by knowing all the answers.

meanings.sent1: The coach outpsyched the other team with his strategic plays.
meanings.sent2: She managed to outpsyche her opponent by analyzing their weaknesses.
meanings.sent3: The magician outpsyched the audience with his mind-bending tricks.
meanings.sent4: The negotiator outpsyched his counterpart by anticipating their moves.
meanings.sent5: The therapist outpsyched her patient by uncovering deep-seated fears.
